text: My message to activists: I am so proud of you. Keep your chin up and your shoulders back, and stay strong. What you are doing is what inspires me to know that there are better days ahead.
RT @guardianopinion Let’s wrench power back from the billionaires | Bernie Sanders http://dlvr.it/QBCDrB

Taking on the greed of Wall Street, the power of gigantic multinational corporations and the influence of the global billionaire class is not only the moral thing to do – it is a strategic geopolitical imperative.
